name: OnPlayerText
notes: This callback can also be called by NPC.
description: Called when a player sends a chat message.

params_body.name: playerid
params_body.description: The ID of the player who typed the text.

return_values: It is always called first in filterscripts so returning 0 there blocks other scripts from seeing it.
related_fn:
SendPlayerMessageToPlayer: Force a player to send text for one player.
 SendPlayerMessageToAll: Force a player to send text for all players.
related_cb:
OnPlayerCommandText: Called when a player types a command.
 SendPlayerMessageToPlayer: Force a player to send text for one player.
 SendPlayerMessageToAll: Force a player to send text for all players.
